targets.expr: quantile(0.67, aptos_consensus_current_epoch_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

quantile(0.67, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name)(aptos_connections{network_id="Validator", role_type="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})) + 1

quantile(0.67, aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"}) / 100000000

targets.rawSql:
with supply_per_epoch as (
select epoch, FLOOR(supply/1e8) total_supply, sum(voting_power/1e8) total_staking
from (
  select transaction_epoch, supply
  from `indexer_mainnet_gcp.coin_supply` 
  QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY transaction_epoch ORDER BY transaction_version DESC) = 1
) a
join `indexer_mainnet_gcp.epoch_validators` b
on a.transaction_epoch = b.epoch
group by 1,2 order by 1),

max_epoch as (select max(epoch) as epoch from supply_per_epoch)

select total_supply from supply_per_epoch a join max_epoch b on a.epoch = b.epoch

targets.expr: irate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])

rate(aptos_vm_txn_gas_usage_sum{kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1h]) / rate(aptos_vm_txn_gas_usage_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~".*", role=~"validator"}[1h])
quantile(0.67, aptos_consensus_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

targets.rawSql: select entry_function_id_str, count(1) from `indexer_mainnet_gcp.user_transactions` group by 1 order by 2 desc LIMIT 10

select substr(cast(timestamp as string),1,10) ds, count(distinct sender) cnt
from `indexer_mainnet_gcp.user_transactions`
group by 1 order by 1 desc limit 10

targets.expr: quantile(0.67, aptos_storage_latest_transaction_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"})

count(clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0) > 50000) OR on() vector(0)

sort_desc(clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"} - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",  role=~"validator", type="synced"}, 0) > 50000 )

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})*100

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"}/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role="validator"})*100

aptos_committed_votes_in_window{chain_name=~"premainnet", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"} + aptos_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"premainnet", namespace=~"telemetry-service", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator"} == 0

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m])) by (le))

panels.title: Validator Sync lag (behind highest known)

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state=~"idle_ms|iowait_ms"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator" , kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", role="validator" , kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state=~"guest_ms|guest_nice_ms"}[$__rate_interval]))
node_process_memory{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}

node_disk_total_space{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} - node_disk_available_space{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}

rate(node_linux_disk_num_reads{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_linux_disk_num_writes{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])

rate(node_network_total_received{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(node_network_total_transmitted{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role="validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])

irate(node_linux_system_cpu_usage{metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", role=~"validator", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", state="iowait_ms"}[1m]) / 1000

panels.title: Validator CPU time waiting for IO

targets.rawSql:
with 
pre_result as (
  select 
    distinct peer_id 
    ,first_value(last_cpu_vendor_id) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as cpu_brand
    ,first_value(rewards_growth) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as rewards_growth
    ,first_value(last_cpu_count) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as cpu_count
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics`
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name'
    -- and substring($kubernetes_pod_name, length($kubernetes_pod_name)-64)
)

,pre_result2 as (
  select
    substring(concat('00',cast(cpu_count as string)),-3) as cpu_count 
    ,cpu_brand
    ,avg(rewards_growth) as rewards_growth
    ,count(distinct peer_id) as count_peers
  from pre_result
  group by 1,2
  order by 2
)

select 
  coalesce(t1.cpu_count,t2.cpu_count) as cpu_count
  -- cast(concat('2000-01-01 00:00:00.',cast(coalesce(t1.cpu_core_count,t2.cpu_core_count) as string)) as timestamp) as cpu_core_count
  ,t1.count_peers as AuthenticAMD
  ,t2.count_peers as GenuineIntel
from (
  select cpu_count, rewards_growth, count_peers
  from pre_result2
  where cpu_brand = 'AuthenticAMD') t1
full join (
  select cpu_count, rewards_growth, count_peers
  from pre_result2
  where cpu_brand = 'GenuineIntel') t2
on t1.cpu_count = t2.cpu_count
order by cpu_count

with 
 result as (
  select 
    distinct peer_id
    ,first_value(latitude) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as latitude
    ,first_value(longitude) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as longitude
    ,first_value(voting_power) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as voting_power
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics`
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name')
  
  select *, 
    voting_power/(sum(voting_power) over ()) as pct_total_voting_power
  from result
  order by pct_total_voting_power desc

with 
 result as (
  select 
    distinct peer_id
    ,first_value(latitude) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as latitude
    ,first_value(longitude) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as longitude
    ,first_value(voting_power) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as voting_power
    ,first_value(rewards_growth) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as latest_epoch_rewards_growth
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics`
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name')
  
  select * from result

with 
result0 as (
  select 
    distinct t1.peer_id, 
    first_value(t1.latest_hash) over (partition by t1.peer_id order by t1.epoch desc) as latest_hash, 
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics` t1
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name'
    -- and substring($kubernetes_pod_name, length($kubernetes_pod_name)-64)
)

select 
  t1.latest_hash, 
  t2.build_time, 
  count(distinct t1.peer_id) as num_validators
from result0 t1
left join `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.build_versions` t2
  on t1.latest_hash = t2.build_commit_hash
group by 1,2

with 
result0 as (
  select 
    distinct t1.peer_id, 
    first_value(t1.last_system_name) over (partition by t1.peer_id order by t1.epoch desc) as system_name, 
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics` t1
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name'
    -- and substring($kubernetes_pod_name, length($kubernetes_pod_name)-64)
)

select 
  t1.system_name, 
  count(distinct t1.peer_id) as num_validators
from result0 t1
group by 1

with 
 result as (
  select 
    distinct peer_id
    ,first_value(latitude) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as latitude
    ,first_value(longitude) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as longitude
    ,first_value(voting_power) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as voting_power
    ,first_value(rewards_growth) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as latest_epoch_rewards_growth
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics`
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name')
  
  select * from result
  where latest_epoch_rewards_growth < 99.9

with 
result0 as (
  select 
    distinct t1.peer_id, 
    first_value(t1.last_disk_type) over (partition by t1.peer_id order by t1.epoch desc) as disk_type, 
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics` t1
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name'
    -- and substring($kubernetes_pod_name, length($kubernetes_pod_name)-64)
)

select 
  t1.disk_type, 
  count(distinct t1.peer_id) as num_validators
from result0 t1
group by 1

with 
 result as (
  select 
    distinct peer_id
    ,first_value(latitude) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as latitude
    ,first_value(longitude) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as longitude
    ,first_value(voting_power) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as voting_power
    ,avg(rewards_growth) over (partition by peer_id) as rewards_growth
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics`
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name')
  
  select * from result
  where rewards_growth < 99.9

select 
    distinct peer_id, 
    first_value(latest_hash) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as latest_hash,
    first_value(latest_build_latency_hours) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as latest_build_latency_hours,
    first_value(last_cpu_brand) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as cpu_brand,
    first_value(last_cpu_count) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as cpu_count,
    first_value(last_cpu_core_count) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as cpu_core_count,
    first_value(last_cpu_frequency) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as cpu_frequency,
    first_value(last_cpu_vendor_id) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as cpu_vendor_id,
    first_value(last_disk_type) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as disk_type,
    first_value(sum_disk_available_space/sum_disk_total_space) 
      over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as avg_disk_pct_available,
    first_value(sum_memory_available/sum_disk_total_space) 
      over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as avg_mem_pct_available,
    first_value(sum_disk_total_space) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as sum_disk_total_space,
    first_value(sum_memory_total) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as sum_memory_total,
    first_value(last_system_name) over (partition by peer_id order by epoch desc) as system_name,
    -- substring($kubernetes_pod_name, len($kubernetes_pod_name)-64)
  from `analytics-test-345723.aptos_node_telemetry.all_chain_telemetry_rollup_metrics`
  where 
    chain_name = '$chain_name'
    -- and substring($kubernetes_pod_name, length($kubernetes_pod_name)-64)
